TITLE: Episode 37 - AI Coders, AI Authors, and Arguing Humans
DESCRIPTION: In this episode, Thaddeus and Gary talk about the incredible potential for AI when it comes to coding and even authoring news stories. They also talk about the death of 3G and the politics of Facebook, with US presidential candidates Donald Trump and Joe Biden each buying up loads of ad space.
